description:
This is a course catered to the small business owner who wants to attract more clients using high-end graphics created with Canva.

You'll learn what images your client is attracted to, how to find the best high resolution photos, and how to design high-end graphics using Canva. Creating these graphics can result in positioning your brand into the high-end market and attracting more clients. We are using very basic elements of design, not advance or complex designs. In this course we've combined a mix of marketing/advertising strategy and basic design principles to better position you for your high-end market.
title: Attract Clients With High-End Graphics
